channel.title: Comments on: 5 Main Benefits Of A Non-Custodial Wallet

item.title: By: Igwetoo
item.dc:creator: Igwetoo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://atomicwallet.io/blog/academy/5-reasons-to-choose-a-non-custodial-wallet#comment-71">Anikys3reasure</a>.
Reasons are enough to say kudos to the team behind the success of this great project. Knowing I can't afford to loss my money, I strong embrace Atomic and make friends to know the equity
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anikys3reasure.

Reasons are enough to say kudos to the team behind the success of this great project. Knowing I can’t afford to loss my money, I strong embrace Atomic and make friends to know the equity

item.title: By: Igwetoo
item.dc:creator: Igwetoo
item.description: Understanding the importance of non-custodial wallet will always keep one close to Atomic Wallet. I'm happy I know this earlier. Atomic is doing more than great.
item.content:encoded: Understanding the importance of non-custodial wallet will always keep one close to Atomic Wallet. I’m happy I know this earlier. Atomic is doing more than great.

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Atomicwallet has been very reliable over the years and it has proven to be a great wallet for me
item.content:encoded: Atomicwallet has been very reliable over the years and it has proven to be a great wallet for me

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: I think security is the very first concern to use any wallet and Atomic Wallet provides full access to our private keys. So this is one of the best crypto wallet.
item.content:encoded: I think security is the very first concern to use any wallet and Atomic Wallet provides full access to our private keys. So this is one of the best crypto wallet.

item.title: By: shariful
item.dc:creator: shariful
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://atomicwallet.io/blog/academy/5-reasons-to-choose-a-non-custodial-wallet#comment-36">Steven</a>.
rightly said, and atomic wallet also support decentralized staking. we can stake top staking currencies and can select own validator. That's cool isn't it?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steven.

rightly said,
and atomic wallet also support decentralized staking. we can stake top staking currencies and can select own validator. That’s cool isn’t it?

item.title: By: Mazel CrypTOV
item.dc:creator: Mazel CrypTOV
item.description: Now we understand why using a non-custodial wallet to store your crypto assets is more preferable than having it in a centralized exchange. Thanks for sharing this very informative article.
item.content:encoded: Now we understand why using a non-custodial wallet to store your crypto assets is more preferable than having it in a centralized exchange. Thanks for sharing this very informative article.

item.title: By: chirao farl
item.dc:creator: chirao farl
item.description: those are major reasons & the reasons why should anybody use non custodial wallet over any other crypto wallets! Most important is our Asset security will be on our hand! And yes, Atomic wallet is the perfect example & one of the best non - custodial wallet!
item.content:encoded:
those are major reasons & the reasons why should anybody use non custodial wallet over any other crypto wallets!
Most important is our Asset security will be on our hand!
And yes, Atomic wallet is the perfect example & one of the best non – custodial wallet!

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description:
Having full access to my wallet is enough reason to use non-custodial wallets. Security is everything a crypto user needs.
Nice article
item.content:encoded:
Having full access to my wallet is enough reason to use non-custodial wallets. Security is everything a crypto user needs.

Nice article

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description: Can't afford to lose my funds to centralized services anymore and that's why I've chosen Atomic. Fully decentralized non-custodial wallet.
item.content:encoded: Can’t afford to lose my funds to centralized services anymore and that’s why I’ve chosen Atomic. Fully decentralized non-custodial wallet.

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: These reasons are great. I'll say Kudos and well done to the team for this wonderful project
item.content:encoded:
These reasons are great.
